flavor_text_entries.red:
When storing
thermal energy in
its body, its temperature could
soar to over 1600
degrees.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
When storing
thermal energy in
its body, its temperature could
soar to over 1600
degrees.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
It has a flame
chamber inside its
body. It inhales, then blows out
fire that is over
3,000F degrees.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
It stores some of
the air it inhales
in its internal flame pouch, which
heats it to over
3,000 degrees.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
It fluffs out its
fur collar to cool
down its body temperature, which
can reach 1,650
degrees.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Once it has stored
up enough heat,
this POKéMON's body temperature
can reach up to
1700 degrees.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
FLAREON’s fluffy fur has a functional
purpose - it releases heat into the air
so that its body does not get excessively hot.
This POKéMON’s body temperature can
rise to a maximum of 1,650 degrees F.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
FLAREON’s fluffy fur has a functional
purpose - it releases heat into the air
so that its body does not get excessively hot.
This POKéMON’s body temperature can
rise to a maximum of 1,650 degrees F.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
FLAREON’s fluffy fur releases heat into
the air so that its body does not get
excessively hot. Its body temperature can
rise to a maximum of 1,650 degrees F.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It has a flame bag inside its body. After
inhaling deeply, it blows out flames of
nearly 3,100 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
When storing thermal energy in its body,
its temperature can soar to over 1,600
degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It has a flame sac in its body.
Its body temperature tops 1,650
degrees Fahrenheit before battle.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
It has a flame sac in its body.
Its body temperature tops 1,650
degrees Fahrenheit before battle.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
Inhaled air is heated in the flame
sac in its body to an intense fire
over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
It stores some of the air it inhales in
its internal flame pouch, which heats it
to over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
It fluffs out its fur collar to cool down
its body temperature, which can reach
1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.black:
Inhaled air is heated in the flame
sac in its body to an intense fire
over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.white:
Inhaled air is heated in the flame
sac in its body to an intense fire
over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac,
heated, and exhaled as fire
that reaches over 3,000 degrees F.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac,
heated, and exhaled as fire
that reaches over 3,000 degrees F.
flavor_text_entries.x:
It has a flame sac in its body. Its body temperature
tops 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit before battle.
flavor_text_entries.y:
It has a flame bag inside its body. After inhaling
deeply, it blows out flames of nearly
3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Flareon’s fluffy fur has a functional purpose—it releases heat
into the air so that its body does not get excessively hot.
This Pokémon’s body temperature can rise to a maximum of
1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Flareon’s fluffy fur has a functional purpose—it releases heat
into the air so that its body does not get excessively hot.
This Pokémon’s body temperature can rise to a maximum of
1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
When it catches prey or finds berries, it
breathes fire on them until they’re well done,
and then it gobbles them up.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
Its average body temperature is between 1,300
and 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. In its internal
flame sac, temperatures reach 3,000 degrees.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
If it inhales deeply, that’s a sign it’s about to
attack. Prepare to be hit by flames of over
3,000 degrees Fahrenheit!
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
The flame chamber inside its body ignites when
Flareon gets agitated, reaching temperatures of
up to 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
It has a flame chamber inside its body. It inhales,
then breathes out fire that is over 3,000
degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:
It has a flame chamber inside its body. It inhales,
then breathes out fire that is over 3,000
degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
Once it has stored up enough heat, this
Pokémon’s body temperature can reach up to
1,700 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal
flame pouch, which heats it to over
3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
Flames burn within a saclike organ inside this Pokémon.
When Flareon inhales, these flames grow in intensity, reaching
a mighty 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
